features.name: CSV File Upload
features.description: Upload CSV files with drag-and-drop or click interface. Supports file validation, size checking, and SSE-based progress streaming.

features.name: File List Management
features.description: Display uploaded files in a paginated table with search functionality. Shows file metadata including name, size, upload date.

features.name: File Details Modal
features.description: View detailed information about a specific file including metadata, timestamps, and file path.

features.name: CSV Analysis Report
features.description: Analyze uploaded CSV files for null values, duplicates, and data quality metrics. Displays comprehensive analysis report with statistics.

features.name: File Deletion
features.description: Delete files from both database and disk storage with confirmation dialog.

features.name: Server-Sent Events (SSE) Upload
features.description: Real-time progress updates during file upload and analysis using Server-Sent Events. Provides live feedback on upload status, analysis progress, and completion.

features.name: Database Models
features.description: SQLAlchemy models for file metadata storage including file information, analysis results, and timestamps.

features.name: Repository Pattern
features.description: Data access layer for file operations including CRUD operations, pagination, and search functionality.

features.name: API Client
features.description: Axios-based API client for frontend-backend communication with typed interfaces for all endpoints.

features.name: UI Components
features.description: Reusable UI components including buttons, dialogs, tables, and count-up animations built with Tailwind CSS.

features.name: Configuration Management
features.description: Application configuration for database, CORS, file upload settings, and environment variables.

features.name: Database Connection
features.description: SQLAlchemy database connection setup, initialization, and session management.

features.name: Logging
features.description: Centralized logging configuration for application-wide logging.

features.name: CSV Data Analysis
features.description: Comprehensive CSV analysis using pandas to detect null values, undefined values, and duplicate records across columns.
